title: Why so many BOTS in ARAM Riot????
body: In my last few ARAM games I've played I've noticed a fair few BOTS and thought hmm okay, I didn't have too much of a issue with it. UNTIL my most recent ARAM game........I was the ONLY human player in the entire game of 10......the other 9 were bots......what the hell Riot? I don't play league to play with bots, I play league to play with other human players. So what is going on? Because that WAS THE MOST BORING game I have EVER played!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Unfortunately, there are a fair few bots in low level games and arams. [Riot do know about the issue and are actively tackling it.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/G8VMUktw-human-bots)

One thing that is **really really really important**, is that you report these accounts. Without your reports, Riot wont know which accounts are bots and need to be banned
i got a penta against bots, i just laughed and carried on, this is just no fun with so many bots *REPORT THEM ALL*
I just played an ARAM with 6 bots. I hit report on them all
